changes.text: Highlighter manager dialog and Highlighter editor page.
Generic highlighters stored in custom text format.
CSS, QSS, SQL built-in syntax highlighters.
Can create custom highlighters stored in catalog.
Fix for restoring of expanded folders.
QSS editor can save style file (dev feature).
New rules for Procyon syntax highlighter - inline code, inline font styles.
Store memo info in catalog - creation and modification date.
Store memo options in catalog - font, word wrap, spellcheck, highlighter.
